participant_1.background:
On my last vacation, I went to an arcade and played a lot of games, but I was scared when I saw a clown.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I sometimes neglect my health due to my busy schedule.
i once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.

participant_2.background:
I just took my dirty laundry out of the hamper.
i work at the grocery store.
i have braces.
i am a mom with two sons and a husband.
I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.

content.text: I just ran the mile in under four minutes! I'm feeling pretty good.
Nice! I'm a mom of two boys and I work at the grocery store, so I don't have much time for exercise.
That's a lot on your plate! I'm impressed that you have the time to work and raise a family.
I have to keep busy, or I'll go crazy!
I hear that. I'm a bit of a loner, so I need my alone time.
I like to have my own space too, but I also love spending time with my friends and family.
I'm not sure I could handle having a family. I like my freedom too much.
I know what you mean. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm happy for you.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and go to arcades.
That sounds like fun! I love to read too. I'm a big fan of Lindsey Stirling.
She's an amazing violinist. You should check her out!
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
